name: High In The Sky
description:
Time to get high in the sky and roll your way through different universes!

High In The Sky makes you relive the era of short arcade games experience like Marble Madness with updated graphics and powered by a modern electronic soundtrack!

The simple controls give you the possibility to enjoy a drink or a cigarette while playing. You can practice all levels at your own pace with checkpoints and unlimited retries. Or you can just go straight in speedrun mode to do a full run perfectly as no errors are allowed. No puzzles, no collectibles, no unlockables, this is pure old-school arcade.

Be sure to also check out the soundtrack!
http://alainfrancke.itch.io/high-in-the-sky-soundtrack

*Supported Screen Resolutions*

Only 16/9 and 16/10 screens are supported

*Recommended Minimal System Requirements*

OS: Windows 7 or 8
CPU: Intel 1,5Ghz
Graphic Card: Intel HD Graphics
RAM: 4Go
Hard Drive Space: 168Mo

Note: the 1.1 version of the game offers two different modes of rendering which can greatly improve your framerate depending on your PC configuration.
